definition: gradual progress/to go forward one stage at a time
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: The paper is made up by four parts which gradually and deep-going introduce consumer credit laws.
sentences.chinese: 论文分四个部分逐步深入递进的介绍消费者信用法。

sentences.english: Uses in the analysis from the surface to the spot, is thorough by the level, layer upon layer progressives principle.
sentences.chinese: 分析采用了由面到点，逐层深入，层层递进的原则。

sentences.english: Traditions and modernism boost each other and the structure of art will remain its Multi-Format.
sentences.chinese: 传统与现代是互动递进的，艺术格局总是多元化的。

sentences.english: The context body is the analysis of climactic relation using eulerian graph.
sentences.chinese: 本文的主体部分是对递进关系进行欧拉图分析。

sentences.english: These are the new results in age structure parity progressive population operator.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是年龄结构人口胎次递进算子新的结果。

sentences.english: In addition to meaning "otherwise", "yaoburan" can also be used to give a suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 表示递进关系，通常用于给别人提建议的时候。

sentences.english: This paper adopts the structure of advance by degrees, including five parts altogether.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用递进式结构，共分五部分。

definition: to arrange/to spread out/to narrate in detail/to describe at great length/to elaborate
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
progress step by step/gradual progress/to move forward (slowly)
to increase by degrees/in increasing order/incremental/progressive
to flash back/flashback (in a novel, movie etc)
